name: nativescript-urlhandler
description: Register custom URLs for your NativeScript app

scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules hooks platforms target '*.js' '*.js.map' 'test/e2e/**/*.js' 'test/e2e/**/*.js.map' test/e2e/platforms test/e2e/node_modules test/e2e/hooks
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run jasmine
scripts.e2e: npm run preparedemo && cd test/e2e && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd test/e2e && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd test/e2e && tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd test/e2e && npm i && tns plugin remove nativescript-urlhandler && tns plugin add ../.. && tns install
scripts.postchangelog: git add ../CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(changelog): Updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): New release version' && npm run changelog && npm run git-tag && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run merge-and-publish
scripts.merge-and-publish:pre: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.merge-and-publish: cd src && mv ../README.md .&& mv ../LICENSE . && npm publish && git reset --hard && git clean -f && cd ..
scripts.merge-and-publish:post: git checkout master && git merge develop

author: Martin Reinhardt
